DialogueText.Text: Hey uh, you know what's going on? I'm still kinda confused...
Really...? Does no one get what's going on around here? How do they run this place...
I don't really know what I'm still doing here... If things like this keep happening, I might just leave.
Hmm... I suppose you're right. Just gotta remain faithful. That's what they always say, and we're nearing the end I guess. I can hold out a little longer.
So we just... wait around? I don't know... I wanna know what I'm meant to do, y'know?
I suppose a break doesn't hurt every now and then. I'm not very used to relaxing.
You think so? I guess if we're near the end, they might not need my help... Maybe it's about time I moved onto something else...
Yeah, you're right! I gotta take charge of things! I'm outta here!

Responses.Title: I need to tell you something...

DialogueText.Text: Nice talking to you. Hope to see you around!
